title: Another Scam, People don't be stupid....
body:
So a friend messaged me this right now " dude riot is giving out mystery gifts to apologize for taliyah lmao <removed> ( don't click the link, I won't say his/her name unless required by Riot) I saw this straight away as a scam, but I was worried that others won't. So be vigilant people!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

I've removed the link from your thread so people don't mistakenly click it :).

I would recommend reporting this players account as compromised [directly to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new).

Thanks for helping out :).
